title: Swiss People's Party
summary: The Swiss People's Party (German: Schweizerische Volkspartei, SVP; Romansh: Partida populara Svizra, PPS), also known as the Democratic Union of the Centre (French: Union d√©mocratique du centre, UDC; Italian: Unione Democratica di Centro, UDC), is a national-conservative,[23][24] right-wing populist political party in Switzerland. Chaired by Marco Chiesa, it is the largest party in the Federal Assembly, with 53 members of the National Council[25] and 6 of the Council of States.
